demos.name: Nonlinear Estimation Framework Demos
demos.description: NEF framework designed for nonlinear state estimation of discrete dynamical systems. The aim of this framework is to facilitate implementation, testing and use of various nonlinear state estimation methods. The main strength of the framework is its versatility due to the possibility of either structural or probabilistic description of the problem. As the toolbox is designed on the object oriented basis, further adding of user-specified nonlinear estimation algorithms is extremely easy.

demoitem.label: State Estimation of Linear Gausian System
